description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The forces of P.E.T.S. are at it again deploying their evil penguin and seal forces in their relentless efforts to take over the world. Smash the seals and avoid the cyborg penguins to help stop the forces of P.E.T.S. today.
description.short: The forces of P.E.T.S. are at it again deploying their evil penguin and seal forces in their relentless efforts to take over the world. Smash the seals and avoid the cyborg penguins to help stop the forces of P.E.T.S. today.
